Package: unacloud

[Groovy] Class MonitorSystem

    • unacloud.MonitorSystem

    • Entity to represent a monitoring system; a group of applications configured in a physical o virtual machine. This class is unused in this version of UnaCloud

      Authors:
      CesarF
